name: Beneath The Mountain (itch)
description:
Version 1.2

Bugfixes 

* Weapon Slot now functions correctly.

* Swipe to turn camera implemented.  The buttons are still in the edges for turning the camera, but you can do it by swiping from one quadrant of the screen to another.  (Both PC [drag w/ mouse] and Android.

* Experience required to level scaled back quite a bit.

* Rings added to game.

* Monsters now have individual loot drop percentages.

* Volume control from the menu screen.  Click on the Cog Wheel in the lower right hand corner.

Like so many adventurers before you, you seek the riches and glory that can only be found Beneath the Mountain.

Designed for PC and Android, this 3d turn based strategy game  is navigated using clicks... When it's your turn, the tiles you can move to will be illuminated.  Simply double click on a tile to move, or double click on a monster to attack.  Right now, in this version, you know two spells, Cure Light Wounds and Fireball.

The Inventory tab in the lower right hand corner will let you equip the loot you pick up.  On the left hand side is the Equipment tab, which can be switch to the Stats panel where you can upgrade your stats with each level.   

Don't be surprised when your enemies surround you.  This game is supposed to be a challenge.  Once you die, you're dead, and have to start over.  (Character saving will be in a future version!)

This game is still in early beta, and there are many more features still to come.  I'm putting it here to get an opportunity for playtesting by a fresh pair of eyes.
